channel.title: Anyone listen to Christian Music?
channel.description:
Dose any one listen to christian music ?? post fav bands/ songs Bands- Tobymac Tenth Ave North Mathew West Mikeschair Brit Nicole Chris August- some Chris Tomlin Newsboys
By Your Side - Tenth Ave North Mikeschair - Let The Waters Rise Tobymac- many many songs Brandon Heath - Give Me Your Eyes

item.title: Anyone listen to Christian Music?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Canownueazy, post:27, topic:369157”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=465282.msg3403164#msg3403164 date=1290120090]
I suppose I can’t admit that I “hate” Christian music. Because now that I think about it, Close Your Eyes is a Christian band. I also believe Three Days Grace is another one if I’m not mistaken. In some respects, I love Christian band’s, though I do not love the pure Christian music.
[/quote]Three Days Grace is far from a Christian band ^.^[/quote]

Ah… I was told diffrent about them. I never paid enough of attention to the lyrics, I can’t explain it. Like I said though, I can’t stand pure Christian music talking about God every sentence or something. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone listen to Christian Music?
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:31, topic:369157”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=465282.msg3403383#msg3403383 date=1290130021]
I’m Muslim so what do you think my answer is?
[/quote]I don’t know, its the same god so it really shouldn’t affect you. Besides, most of the music doesn’t even sound religious (at least my bands don’t).[/quote]

I know it took me a month to realize skillet was Christian rock lol really depends on the song whether I like it or not

Read full topic
